lines.text: The police showed up after the fire started...
But that doesn't mean it couldn't have been their fault!
We're talking chronomancy. We're talking correspondences. We're talking inverse causation.
Are we talkin' those things? What're you actually sayin'?
Someone in the police department needed to meet an arrest quota, right?
So they cast a spell to make an arson have already happened, by someone else's hand, using chronomantic-
First off, we got a detection system down at the station. Ain't nobody usin' magic down there and gettin' away with it.
Second off- chronomancy? You talkin' time travel? Is that somethin' we have to be worried about?
...Leading theorists say it's hypothetically possible for-
Aren't actually possibilities, and also they'd be a nightmare to deal with.
Let's stick to linear-time explanations from here on out.
